To compile and run biofilmfitness.cpp

```shell
abstractiontransitions/minimalc++ [master] $ mpic++ biofilmfitness.cpp -o biofilmfitness -lm -O6 -m64 -std=c++11
cc1plus: error: unrecognized command line option ‘-std=c++11’
abstractiontransitions/minimalc++ [master] $ mpic++ biofilmfitness.cpp -o biofilmfitness -lm -O6 -m64 -std=c++0x
abstractiontransitions/minimalc++ [master] $ ls
biofilmfitness  biofilmfitness.cpp  decsize  histogram.cpp  noreplacement  popstructure
abstractiontransitions/minimalc++ [master] $ ./biofilmfitness 5 100 0.01 10 100 100 1
abstractiontransitions/minimalc++ [master] $ ls
1_0.txt  biofilmfitness  biofilmfitness.cpp  decsize  histogram.cpp  noreplacement  popstructure
abstractiontransitions/minimalc++ [master] $ cat 1_0.txt
```
